page.title: 21Walkergate Education
page.content: Walkergate School was knocked down in 2008 and replaced by a state of the art school. Walkergate was the last school in Newcastle to be a separate infant and junior school. Mr Cobb got his way, the prefabs and the outdoor toilets were knocked down. Currently Benfield School has been modernized and Walker School has been rebuilt and reopens in Swptember 2011 called The Heart of Walker. I was involved in the original submission
